derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: apparently representing an Old English word from the Germanic root of wax

entry.def: Your waist is the middle part of your body where it narrows slightly above your hips.

example.ex: Ricky kept his arm round her waist...
He was stripped to the waist.

entry.def: The waist of a garment such as a dress, coat, or pair of trousers is the part of it which covers the middle part of your body.

means.word_mean: 1. the narrowing of the body between the ribs and hips
2. the narrow part of the shoe connecting the heel and the wide part of the sole
